input.sentences: it time for a little fun and i ca n't wait . of course i have to help with parking .
packing the car so i can find my change of clothes for later .
i have everything i need in here now and ready for some fun .
there is a strong wind trying to whip us from place to place but nothing will stop this party .
what a fun night . time to go home and get some rest .
output.sentences: The girls were preparing for the surprise party and trying to decide if the trunk was large enough to fit everything.
As they were loading up, someone said, "here comes Tom; don't let him see inside the trunk or it will spoil the surprise!"
Kate replied, "It's ok, I already took everything inside to set up."
Later, after the party, Eve was so drunk, she couldn't remember where they had parked the car.
Some of the gang ended up driving around until they finally found her car about two blocks away.
